author: acolytec3
content: <@489914064919855114> I listened to the recording of the call and you mentioned something about the generator tool supporting markdown files in the gatsby template so I was going to play around with this in my local branch with the generator v2.  Is there any guidance on where to put markdown files so they picked up by gatsby and rendered in the docs or is that additional code that would need to be added to the generator code base to make this happen?
